sensory_systems.name: Advanced LiDAR Systems

sensory_systems.name: Hyperspectral Imaging Sensors

sensory_systems.name: Acoustic Mapping Sensors

sensory_systems.accuracy_metrics: Frequency Response: 20Hz - 20kHz, Directional Accuracy: <1 degree, Noise Floor: -70dB

sensory_systems.name: Thermal Imaging Arrays (Advanced)
sensory_systems.description: Microbolometers with significantly improved sensitivity (detecting <1°C temperature differences) and dynamic range, operating in various wavelengths.

sensory_systems.name: Strain and Force Sensors (Nano-Scale)

sensory_systems.accuracy_metrics: Force Resolution: 100 nN, Strain Resolution: 10 με, Dynamic Range: 100:1

control_systems.name: Real-Time Digital Control (RT-DC) Systems
control_systems.description: Distributed control architectures based on Field Programmable Gate Arrays (FPGAs) and specialized microcontrollers, enabling deterministic control of individual HPC components and sub-systems.

control_systems.name: Adaptive Control Algorithms (Reinforcement Learning)
control_systems.description: AI-powered control systems leveraging reinforcement learning to optimize resource allocation, power consumption, and cooling efficiency in real-time based on sensor feedback.

mechanical_systems.name: Microfluidic Cooling Systems

mechanical_systems.name: Self-Assembly Robotic Maintenance
mechanical_systems.description: Small, agile robots capable of assembling, disassembling, and repairing HPC components using pre-programmed sequences and visual guidance.
mechanical_systems.specifications: Payload Capacity: 1-10 kg, Precision: ±1mm, Operating Speed: 1-5 m/s

mechanical_systems.name: Variable Geometry HPC Chassis
mechanical_systems.description: HPC chassis with dynamically adjustable geometry (e.g., fluid channel redirection) to optimize airflow and cooling based on workload conditions.

software_integration.name: Digital Twin Platform
software_integration.description: A fully realized digital twin of the HPC system, constantly updated with real-time sensor data and simulation results for predictive maintenance and optimization.
software_integration.specifications: Data Synchronization Latency: <10ms, Simulation Accuracy: λ/10

software_integration.name: AI-Powered Resource Orchestration
software_integration.description: Software automating the allocation of compute resources, memory, and I/O bandwidth based on application requirements and system performance.
software_integration.specifications: Resource Allocation Accuracy: 90-95% reduction in wasted resources

software_integration.name: Federated Learning Frameworks
